| HistoryText             = The Twelve Horrors were disciples of the [[Murderous Lion (Earth-616)|Murderous Lion]]. Who studied one of the most forbidden forms of kung fu, one that physically transformed its practitioners into eldritch abominations. They fought [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]] and [[Elsa Bloodstone (Earth-616)|Elsa Bloodstone]] on Isla De La Sombra, off the coast of [[Morocco]]. The Twelve Horrors were sent by the Murderous Lion to kill anyone else who was seeking the [[Dreaming Maiden (Earth-616)|Dreaming Maiden]]. They were defeated, with some of them slain by the two.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 314}} On one of the worlds that the two visited through the [[Valley of Gates]], they fought and defeated the Twelve Horrors again.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 315}}
